title: Austere Manufacturing Ladder Pin Locks in Clear Ano
content:
Austere Manufacturing is continuing to offer its product line in clear anodizing for those who like the look of raw aluminum ($19.85). The latest product to receive this treatment is the brand’s made in the USA 1″ Ladder Pin Locks, which John reviewed two years ago. These ladder pin buckles replace plastic hardware on your favorite bags by being pressed in with lock jaws like Knipex pliers, securely attaching to nylon webbing. Because they’re aluminum, you’ll never have to fuss with a broken buckle again. Overkill? Maybe. Cool as hell? You bet. Check out more at Austere Manufacturing.

The post Austere Manufacturing Ladder Pin Locks in Clear Ano appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
